data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos-Da-Silva, Andria De Paula, Carvalho, Leonardo Sousa, Brescovit, Antonio Domingos (2017): Two new species of Bothriurus Peters, 1861 (Scorpiones, Bothriuridae) from Northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4258 (3): 238-256, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4258.3.2|21 occurrences
